content.description: This session takes a closer look at ACI and how to leverage this amazing service. We will use some of the other serverless components and have a see how these can work together for advanced workloads and how this on demand compute service can help in the most challenging of workloads.
RestAPI development with AWS Lambda - Node.js. As you know, Serverless architecture is getting more to the table day by day. Let see how it work together ;)
content.organizer: Software & Tech Trends - Zero To Hero

content.description: Datadog invites you to participate in our inaugural multi-day serverless conference. We’ll explore the serverless ecosystem, dive into JAMStack architectures and scaling considerations, and share learnings from industry experts spread over three days.

content.event: Deep Visibility - Serverless Logging with AWS
content.description: In this Meetup brought to you by Big Compass and AWS, we will explore techniques of logging from the typical iPaas or always-on managed system like a custom application on an EC2, and we will balance that with a discussion on logging from serverless microservices such as AWS Lambda also.

content.event: Knative101 K8s-based platform to build and run serverless workloads
content.description: Knative is a new open source project that’s generating a lot of excitement in the Kubernetes and Serverless communities. It’s a great fit for application developers, especially those who already use Kubernetes, allowing them to focus more on their business logic and less on infrastructure.

content.event: Connect Serverless Events with Cloud Eventarc
content.description: Cloud Run is great for running containers in a serverless way but how do you feed events to those containers? Cloud Eventarc provides primitives to build event-driven architectures and trigger services with CloudEvents. In this session, get an overview of Cloud Eventarc, the CloudEvent format, and watch a couple demos.

content.event: Webinar: Build Serverless Flows with AWS Step Functions
content.description:
In this webinar, we will go through an example workflow in a hands-on AWS Step Functions tutorial: use-cases, difficulties, and solutions. 
Combining Cloudway's experience with Lumigo's monitoring and debugging solution, we will provide a full framework to manage multiple subsystems into a single serverless flow, and get the work done.

Let the cloud provider manage your servers. Only pay for what you use, and get to production faster. Build simple automated backups of your resources, or build large auto-scaling, auto-failing(over) applications. Use AWS Serverless Application Repository so you don’t reinvent the wheel. The possibilities are endless.

content.event: AWS Stack creation using serverless framework
content.description: CloudFormation introduction and example, Serverless introduction, Deploy and update AWS services stack to different stages(dev, prod etc), A short sight to terraform vs cloudFormation vs serverless

content.event: Add the magic of realtime and serverless to Angular applications
content.description: I am happy to announce that Sajeetharan (Azure Cloud Architect) from Microsoft will be the speaker of December month edition, he will talk about Angular + Azure in this session. Don't miss out this interesting session.

A 4-week introduction to running containers on AWS taught by AWS Container Hero Vlad Ionescu. Running Containers on AWS will teach you everything you need to know to start running containers using Docker, Fargate and Kubernetes.
11 January 2021 - 5 February 2021
£400, €450, $520

Start with an introduction into Lambda, introducing foundational concepts, moving onto API security, testing strategies, CI/CD, secret management, and finishing with operational best practices.
18 January - 15 February 2021
